edu.uci.isr.impromptu.security
Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.security.UserManager
public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class controls how user authentication should be done. It controls what password is for me. It also controls whether me will blindly accept any requests, or it will reject certain users. For accepted users, it controls what their passwords should be.

Author:
Jie Ren
